description: Custom skills for nemo curator local

skills.name: aud-asr
skills.description: Transcribe audio using NeMo ASR models (Parakeet, FastConformer). GPU recommended.

skills.name: aud-wer
skills.description: Calculate Word Error Rate (WER) to assess transcription quality. Filter low-quality audio-transcript pairs.

skills.name: audio
skills.description: Process audio and speech data including ASR transcription, Word Error Rate calculation, and quality filtering. Use when the user wants to transcribe audio, assess speech quality, or filter audio data.

skills.name: curator
skills.description: Main entry point for NeMo Curator data curation. Use when the user mentions data curation, deduplication, filtering, classification, video/text/image/audio processing, pipeline building, or working wi

skills.name: help
skills.description: Command reference and guidance for NeMo Curator agent skills. Use when the user asks for help, wants to see available commands, or needs guidance on which skill to use.

skills.name: image
skills.description: Process image datasets including CLIP embedding, aesthetic filtering, NSFW detection, and deduplication. Use when the user wants to filter images, generate embeddings, or remove inappropriate content.

skills.name: img-aesthetic
skills.description: Score and filter images by aesthetic quality using LAION aesthetic predictor. GPU required.

skills.name: img-embed
skills.description: Generate CLIP embeddings for images for search, similarity, and deduplication. GPU required.

skills.name: img-nsfw
skills.description: Detect and filter NSFW/inappropriate image content. GPU required.

skills.name: project
skills.description: Set up and organize a data curation project. Use when the user is starting a new curation project, asks about directory structure, file organization, naming conventions, or how to organize their data

skills.name: schema
skills.description: Query NeMo Curator's Agent Tool Schema to discover available operations, their parameters, GPU requirements, and composition rules. Use when the user asks what operations exist, what parameters a stag

skills.name: schema-update
skills.description: Regenerate and validate the Agent Tool Schema after NeMo Curator changes. Use when NeMo Curator has been updated and the schema needs to be refreshed, or when contributing new stages.

skills.name: setup
skills.description: Install and configure NeMo Curator with automatic environment detection.

skills.name: setup-ray
skills.description: Configure Ray clusters for distributed NeMo Curator execution.

skills.name: stages
skills.description: Look up NeMo Curator processing stages by modality and category.

skills.name: text
skills.description: Curate text/document data with filtering, classification, and deduplication. Use when the user wants to process text, clean documents, or build text datasets. Entry point for all text curation.

skills.name: txt-classify
skills.description: Classify text documents using ML models for quality scoring, domain detection, educational content, and safety filtering. GPU required.

skills.name: txt-dedup
skills.description: Remove near-duplicate documents using MinHash and LSH. GPU recommended for large datasets.

skills.name: txt-filter
skills.description: Filter text documents using heuristic rules (word count, URLs, repetition, punctuation). CPU-only, no GPU required. Entry point for text curation.

skills.name: validate
skills.description: Validate generated NeMo Curator code against the Agent Tool Schema. Use when the user wants to check if their pipeline code is correct, uses valid operations, or has correct parameters.

skills.name: vid-caption
skills.description: Generate text captions for video clips using Qwen VL vision-language model. Requires full GPU.

skills.name: vid-clip
skills.description: Extract video clips using scene detection (TransNetV2, 10GB GPU) or fixed intervals (CPU only).

skills.name: vid-embed
skills.description: Generate video embeddings for search and similarity using Cosmos-Embed1 or InternVideo2. GPU required (20GB for Cosmos, 10GB for InternVideo2).

skills.name: video
skills.description: Process video data including clip extraction, scene detection, captioning, and embedding generation. Use when the user wants to process videos, extract clips, generate captions, or create video embedd
